post:
Superlative quality, Superb Services and Economical Rates is what we have been providing since Aug 2002. If you are looking in terms of quality and reliability, here we are.

Semi-Dedicated Hosting Package

Whether you are looking for larger resource for your own use or reselling? Our semi-dedicated server package will benefit you most:

:: Plan Theta ::

6 Gb webspace
50 Gb bandwidth
2 dedicated IPs
Max. 10 users on 1 server
US$49/mth

:: Plan Iota ::

12 Gb webspace
100 Gb bandwidth
2 dedicated IPs
Max. 5 users on 1 server
US$79/mth

All Semi-Dedicated plans come with:

:: WHM/CPANEL
:: Host Unlimited Domain/Subdomain
:: Unlimted:
FTP/MYSQL/Emails/
Mailing List/URL forwarders/
E mail Autoresponders/
:: SSL support
:: PHP/SSI/PERL/CGI
:: Autoinstaller
:: more available at http://addvaluehost.com/semi.php


Our multi-domain hosting package give you the freedom and ability to manage your individual domain separately with its own control panel and unique features. This is commonly use for reseller account as well.

:: Plan Gamma ::

Host 5 domains
200 mb webspace
5 Gb bandwidth
$7.99/mth

:: Plan Delta ::

Host 7 domains
350 mb webspace
7 Gb bandwidth
$9.99/mth

:: Plan Eplison ::

Host 10 domains
500 mb webspace
10 Gb bandwidth
$14.99/mth

:: Plan Zeta ::

Host 15 domains
750 mb webspace
15 Gb bandwidth
$19.99/mth

:: Plan Eta ::

Host 20 domains
1000 mb webspace
20 Gb bandwidth
$24.99/mth

[All prices are quoted in USD]

Extra Features:

*Annoymous DNS
*Free file transfer
*Free Tempates
etc...

All packages come with WHM and CPANEL standard features:

Unrestricted Subdomains
Unrestricted FTP/Emails/MYSQL database
Unrestricted Mailing List/Emails Autoresponder/URL Forwarder
PHP/PERL/CGI/SSI/SSL support
etc...

more details available at http://addvaluehost.com/multi.php
and http://addvaluehost.com/fullplan.php

Datacenter: NAC
Server: P4 Intel 2.4ghz cpu and 1gb RAM, 512kb cache.
Uptime: Consistently high. Reports available at
http://forums.addvaluehost.com/index.php?act=SF&f=18
Support: 24/7 Helpdesk and Forum.

*Enquiries can be done at either http://forums.addvaluehost.com or mktg@addvaluehost.com
